overview.en: This page summarises the learning goals for Standard 1. The content is presented in English and Setswana so learners can study and practice both languages.
overview.tn: Letlhakatshego le le bokanyeditsweng la dithuto tsa Sekala 1. Dikgang tse di bontshiwa ka Sekgoa le Setswana gore barutwa ba ithute le go itlhatlhoba ka dipuo ka bobedi.

general.en: Understand and apply basic hygiene practices.
general.tn: Tlhaloganya le go dira mekgwa ya motheo ya boitekanelo.

specific.en: Lesson 1 — Personal hygiene: washing hands, bathing, clean clothes.
specific.tn: Thuto 1 — Boitekanelo jwa motho: go tlhapa diatla, go tlhapa mmele, diaparo tse di phepa.

specific.en: Lesson 2 — Safe use of tools and avoiding hazards in the classroom and at home.
specific.tn: Thuto 2 — Tshedimosetso ya go dirisa didirisiwa sentle le go ipaakanyetsa go se kitla ga diragala kotsi mo sekolong le mo gae.

specific.en: Lesson 3 — Simple first aid: what to do for small cuts and insect bites.
specific.tn: Thuto 3 — Kalafo ya ntlha e e motlhofo: se o se dirang fa motho a gatwa kgotsa a dekatlwa ke ditlhabi.

title.tn: Yuniti 2.1 — Motheo wa Go Reetsa le Go Bua

general.en: Begin to recognise sounds and use simple words and greetings.
general.tn: Simolola go lemoga modumo le go dirisa mafoko a motlhofo le dithaelo.

specific.en: Lesson 1 — Common greetings and simple questions.
specific.tn: Thuto 1 — Dithaelo tse di tlwaelegileng le dipotso tse di motlhofo.
Thuto 2 — Tlhalosa modumo wa mafoko a motlhofo sentle.

title.tn: Moduli 3 — Go Bala le go Kwala (Tlalelo)
Yuniti 3.1 — Ditlhaka le Mafoko a Motlhofo

general.en: Recognise letters and read simple words.
general.tn: Lemoga ditlhaka le bala mafoko a motlhofo.

specific.en: Lesson — Identify letters A–M and form simple words.
specific.tn: Thuto — Lemoga ditlhaka A–M le tlhama mafoko a motlhofo.
